description.narrative: The Global Environmental Objective is: To increase access to improved irrigation services and agricultural inputs, and strengthen the integrated management of natural resources in the Selected Landscapes by the local actors and, to provide immediate and effective response to an Eligible Crisis or Emergency.

condition.narrative: Dated covenant. Schedule 2, Section 2, Part E, paragraph 2. The Recipient shall furnish to the Association, as soon as available,but in any case not later than November 30 of each year, the annual work plans and budgets approved by the IPSC and the evidencesreferred to in subparagraph 1(b) above, for the Association's review and approval; except for the annual work plan and budget forthe Project for the first year of Project implementation, and the evidence which may be required for the implementation of theactivities included in the draft annual work plan and budget for such period, which shall be furnished no later than one (1) monthafter the Effective Date.
Dated covenant. The Recipient shall furnish to the Association, no later than two (2) month after the Effective Date, adopt agender-based violence action plan satisfactory to the Association

Finance Agreement :Annual Work Plan and Budget for the first year of Project implementation | Description :The annual work plan andbudget for the Project for the first year of Project implementation, and the evidence which may be required for the implementationof the activities included in the annual work plan and budget for that period, shall be furnished to the Association, not laterthanone (1) month after the Effectiveness Date. | Due Date :26, November 2017

Finance Agreement :Establishment of a Procurement complaint handling mechanism | Description :The Recipient shall have establisheda procurement complaint handling mechanism acceptable to the Association not later than three (3) months after the EffectivenessDate. | Due Date :26 January, 2018

Finance Agreement :Irrigation infrastructure and large dams | Description :The Project shall not finance any new constructions orrehabilitation of large-scale irrigation facilities; nor shall it finance any dams above 15 meters or reservoirs of more than three(3) million cubic meter.
